citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:45am on
October 22, 2024. The inspector arrived at the facility and was informed the licensee was away for the week. An attempt
to call the phone number on the account resulted in having to leave a message. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:45am on 
October 22, 2024. The inspector arrived at the facility and was informed the licensee was away for the week. An attempt 
to call the phone number on the account resulted in having to leave a message. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
